Kim Jong Il's Work Brought Out in Chile
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Brought Out in Chile 
    Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Imprenta Federal Publishing House, Chile, on Aug. 18.
 The work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), clarified the historic five-point policy of the great national unity which serves as important guidelines in achieving the great unity of the Korean nation.    
 The five-point policy of the great national unity called on all the Koreans to unite on the principle of national independence under the banner of patriotism and reunification, improve the relations between the north and the south and struggle against the domination and interference of foreign forces and anti-reunification forces and have contact and dialogue and strengthen the solidarity and alliance between compatriots.

Greetings to President of Ukraine
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Ukraine
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Leonid Kuchma, president of Ukraine, on the occasion of its national day.
 Expressing the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished the president and people of Ukraine success in their work for the prosperity of the country

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Ukraine
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Ukraine
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Viktor Yanukovich, prime minister of Ukraine, on the occasion of its national day.
 In the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished him success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Chairman of NDP of Nepal Arrives
articles.content:
Chairman of NDP of Nepal Arrives
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) --Pashupati Shumsher J. B. Raya, chairman of the National Democratic Party of Nepal, and his party arrived here today.
 They were met at the airport by Kim Thae Jong, vice-director of a department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
